mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_identification, user_password, user_email, user_phoneNumber, user_address, user_register_date) VALUES(#{userIdentification}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userAddress}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

insert into tbl_member (user_id, member_name, member_nickname, member_gender) values((select user_id from tbl_user where user_identification = #{userIdentification}), #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberGender})

insert into tbl_institution (user_id, institution_name, institution_business_number) values((select user_id from tbl_user where user_identification = #{userIdentification}), #{institutionName}, #{institutionBusinessNumber})
